channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station

item.title: CVE-2024-23580|2024-05-28T21:29:15.698Z -- HCL Software -- DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted byÂ insecure encryption of One-Time Passwords (OTPs). This could allow an attacker with access to the database to recover some or all encrypted values.

item.title: CVE-2024-23579|2024-05-28T21:25:18.110Z -- HCL Software -- DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station
item.description: HCL DRYiCE Optibot Reset Station is impacted by insecure encryption of security questions. This could allow an attacker with access to the database to recover some or all encrypted values.
